a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of students achieving no or minimum learning outcomes vs. education spending per
Total education expenditure encompasses both governmental and household spending on education. Achievement outcomes come from standardized,
psychometrically-robust international and regional tests. In order to maximize coverage, the most recent available data were used for both the learning
Public and private per capita expenditure on education (PPP, constant 2011-intl $)
Share of students reaching no or minimum achievement only (2005-2015)
Data source: Angrist et al. (2019); UNESCO (2019); World Bank (2019)
